thread.title: Michelle E Talbot
thread.title_full: Gardner-White Furniture reviewed by Michelle E Talbot

author: Michelle E Talbot
title: Michelle E Talbot
text:
We have purchased from here before and have had no problems . This table and chairs was a special order and was very easy, from start to finish!
Delivery team was outstanding!! Very professional and made sure we were satisfied with everything before they left!
